attributes.action: Condemn Spain's suppression of civil rights in the Catalonian independence vote
attributes.additional_details: Television footage of last week on BBC and ITV of Spanish national police hitting people with batons.
attributes.background: People want to determine their future in Catalonia. The Spanish state and courts have refused this. PM Rajoy is stopping a fair referendum and so interfering with democracy. TV pictures show police hitting people with batons. We ask PM May to condemn violence and breach of European democracy.
